message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $60 while you get $40. This way, both of us benefit reasonably before inflation kicks in. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your counteroffer. Considering that if you wait you'll have the advantage in the next round but at a 5% inflation cost, I believe this division is fair for both of us. You receive $48.72 and I get $51.28â€”a split that reflects the bargaining positions and the discounting effect. I hope you agree to secure our earnings now before further inflation hits.
